Public Member Functions

VrApiRc Abort ()
 Abort currently ongoing training or recognition process. This method does a hard abort of any ongoing process.
void CreateTemplate (const WString &client_name, const WString &text)
 Create template based on a given string using G2A. With G2A speaker independent templates can be created out of a given text. This text must be between 3 and 40 characters long.
VrApiRc GetAppTemplates (const WString &client_name, Vector< UINT16 > &template_ids)
 Return templates of a client, client_name acts as key The ids of the templates belonging to the given client are added to the given vector. The vector must be initialised. It may contain ids before. Template ids are just added to the vector, the vector must be initialised before.
VrCommand GetCommand (UINT16 template_id)
 Return the command behind a predefined template id.
VrApiRc GetCommandTemplates (VrCommandSet set, Vector< UINT16 > &template_ids)
 Return templates for a set of fixed commands.
virtual HandlerId GetHandlerId () const
 Returns the handler's identifier as specified in the anonymous enumeration.

 Initialize Voice Recognition.

 Check if current VR engine supports a function. This method checks if the used VR engine supports a certain function or not.
VrApiRc PlayTemplate (UINT16 template_id)
 Playback trained template.
VrApiRc RemoveAllTemplates (const WString &client_name)
 Delete all templates belonging to a client.
VrApiRc RemoveTemplate (const WString &client_name, UINT16 template_id)

void StartRecognition (const Vector< UINT16 > &id_set, VrRecognitionMode mode=ConnectedWord, UINT16 max_time=700, UINT32 max_silence=80)
 Start recognition for a set of templates Kicks off an actual recognition process.
void StartRecording ()
 Starts recording for training or recognition after prompt. Starts voice recording for the currently ongoing recognition or training process. This method has to be called by the client after prompting the user to start speaking is done.
void StartTraining (const WString &client_name)
 Start training for a user defined command.
VrApiRc StopRecognition ()
 Stop repeated mode recognition after prompt request, feature not yet finished Stops currently ongoing recognition process. This method can be called by a client whilst an recognition process to stop it (e.g. if the received results are sufficent).
 VrHandler ()
 Creates a new handler instance. This constructor creates a new instance of VrHandler. The VR module is initialized if not done before.
virtual ~VrHandler ()
 Destructs an handler instance, nothing happening (in VR point of view).

Detailed Description

Interface for Apoxi VR usage.

VrHandler enables usage of voice recognition. Client who want to use voice recgnition have to use this interface. The code samples in the method's documentation show the usage of voice recognition.
